com.facebook.react.views.text

Class CustomLineHeightSpan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.views.text.CustomLineHeightSpan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.style.LineHeightSpan, android.text.style.ParagraphStyle, android.text.style.WrapTogetherSpan

    public class CustomLineHeightSpan
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.text.style.LineHeightSpan
    We use a custom LineHeightSpan, because `lineSpacingExtra` is broken. Details here: https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/7546
